suggestion: Add the enhanced save functionality to preserve themes and layouts. The current save function doesn't capture the dynamic theme variables or layout settings, causing saved websites to lose their appearance.
Replace the existing save button event handler with the enhanced version that captures current theme state (layout, theme, mode, colors) and embeds them directly into the saved HTML file.

Add a getCurrentWebsiteState() function that extracts all current styling information including data-layout, data-theme, data-mode attributes and CSS custom properties for --primary, --secondary, --accent colors.

Implement generateCompleteWebsite() function that creates a standalone HTML file with embedded CSS and initialization scripts, removing builder-specific elements like control panels and edit mode indicators.
Add generateThemeCSS() function that creates embedded CSS with all theme variables and layout styles, ensuring the saved website maintains its visual appearance without external dependencies.
Enhance the import functionality with importWebsiteWithTheme() to detect and restore theme settings from imported HTML files, updating the control panel to match the imported website's configuration.
Add updateControlPanelFromState() function to synchronize control panel UI elements (theme selector, mode toggle, layout selector) with the current website state after import operations.
Include theme initialization script in saved HTML that immediately applies data-theme, data-mode, and data-layout attributes to prevent flash of unstyled content when the saved website loads.
Modify the save filename to include theme information (e.g., 'website-cyberpunk-dark-left-nav-2025-07-05.html') for better organization and identification of saved websites.
Add error handling and user feedback for save/import operations, showing success messages with theme details and handling cases where theme extraction fails.
Remove contenteditable attributes and edit mode classes from saved HTML to ensure the exported website doesn't have builder-specific styling or behaviors that could confuse end users.
Strip out insert media buttons and other builder UI elements from the saved HTML while preserving the actual media content that users have added to their website.
Ensure CSS custom properties (--primary, --secondary, --accent) are properly embedded in the saved file's style section so colors persist without relying on external stylesheets.
